New Records: Gerrit Cole pitched 7 strong innings allowing just 1 run for the Yankees.
The Royals scored their only run in the 6th inning with a sacrifice fly by Maikel Garcia.
Key Match Events: Benches cleared after a hard tag by Anthony Volpe on Maikel Garcia in the 6th inning.
David Fry hit a two-run home run in the 7th inning for the Guardians.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge praised Gerrit Cole's performance after the Yankees' win.
The Cleveland Guardians ended a 11-game playoff elimination streak with their victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees clinched their best-of-five ALDS series with a 3-1 win.
The Guardians and Tigers set up a Game 5 for the ALCS.
